title: Kitty Carousel
description: An endless parade of cute kittens that will make you want to scratch your eyes out. Written in vanilla JavaScript.

title: Connect 4
description: The classic two-player game, but purple. Written in JQuery.

title: Ticker Tape
description: A scrolling list of doom of gloom from the early days of the plague in Europe. Written in vanilla JavaScript

title: Incremental Search
description: Search for a country. Note: results are pulled from an external API, so may take a few seconds to start loading.

title: Sliding Panes
description: Day and night photos of the Brandenburg Gate, Berlin. Written in JQuery.

title: Search Spotify
description: Search spotify for artists or albums. Written in JQuery.
